member.name: T:Goedel.Callsign.CallsignEntry
member.summary: Entries that may appear in the Callsign registry log. Three types of entry are currently defined: Entries relating to registration and transfer of callsigns, Entries relating to descriptions of callsign character pages and entries relating to cross notarization of the log by third parties.

member.name: M:Goedel.Callsign.CatalogRegistration.Factory(System.String,System.String,Goedel.Mesh.IMeshClient,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.DarePolicy,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.CryptoParameters,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.IKeyCollection,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Directory of store file on local machine.
Store identifier.
Cryptographic parameters for the store.
The cryptographic policy to be applied to the catalog.
Key collection to be used to resolve keys
If true, attempt decryption of payload contents./
If true, create a new file if none exists.
Parent account context used to obtain a mesh client.

member.name: M:Goedel.Callsign.CatalogRegistration.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.DarePolicy,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.CryptoParameters,Goedel.Cryptography.Dare.IKeyCollection,Goedel.Mesh.IMeshClient,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor for a catalog named in directory using the cryptographic parameters and key collection .
member.param: Create a new persistence store on disk if it does not already exist.
Attempt to decrypt the contents of the catalog if encrypted.
The directory in which the catalog persistence container is stored.
The catalog persistence container file name.
The default cryptographic enhancements to be applied to container entries.
The cryptographic policy to be applied to the container.
The key collection to be used to resolve keys when reading entries.
Parent account context used to obtain a mesh client.
